def subArrayProblem(n):
    arr = []
    rangeStep = 2
    rangeStart = 2
    rangeEnd = n + n + 1
    if n % 2 == 0:
        rangeStep = 2
        rangeStart = 1
        rangeEnd = n + n
    if n == 1:
        arr.append(1)
        return arr
    for i in range(rangeStart, rangeEnd, rangeStep):
        arr.append(i)
    return arr
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    for j in subArrayProblem(n):
        print(j, end=' ')
    print()
